page.title: 02Family Life
page.content: My name is Ann Gowman and{I am 15. {My family live in Windsor}and I attend a Comprehensive School. Dad is 45 and works in Slough. Mum is 42 and is a{night nurse.}My sister is 19 and works as a typist. On a typical day I rise at 7.00a.m. and have toast and coffee. We all leave the house by 8.00a.m. after watching breakfast television. Mum returns from work at 8.30a.m. and by 10.30a.m. is in bed. I return home at 3.30p.m., watch T.V. and begin my{homework.}By 5.30p.m. we have dinner and watch Crossroads. I go to {ballroom dancing class}when Mum leaves for her night shift at 7.30p.m. My sister does the ironing whilst Dad works on the car. I return home at 11.45p.m. after a long day.
